name.ja: <ruby>真紅眼の鋼爪竜<rt>レッドアイズ・メタルクロウドラゴン</rt></ruby>

text.en: You can activate "Metalmorph" Trap Cards the turn they are Set. You can only use each of the following effects of "Red-Eyes Metal Claw Dragon" once per turn. You can send 1 face-down card you control to the GY; Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned, and you have "Max Metalmorph" in your field or GY: You can add 1 "Metalmorph" Trap from your Deck or GY to your hand.
